name: billiards-bug
description: Billiards score overlay application for streaming

scripts.compile-frontend: tsc src/public/*.ts --outDir dist/public --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node
scripts.dev: npm run compile-frontend && npm run copy-frontend && NODE_OPTIONS= ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only src/server.ts
scripts.pkg: npm run build && pkg dist/server.js --out-path dist/
